title: Looking for players to make a new ranked 5 team
body:
I have a long history in organizing ranked 5 teams and I am looking to find new players to make a new one. I expect everyone to have facebook ( so i can post up when we will be playing) curse or skype so we can catch and please be active.

Season 5 is coming soon. I have big plans for my team, I plan to get jackets make a website and make a group of close friends playing together.

Players have the following;

- Be active
-Willing to learn
-Be nice to other players
-Commit to the team
-have good communication ( tell me when u can play and not)
- Communicate on skype and fb as well.


For those wondering i currently have a plat 5 ranked 5 team and a gold 4. So yeah add me =)

replies.body: Um i have like availability issues  during the weekdays so if 9.30pm till 2am  AEST or 11.30pm till 4 am nz time works for you than ill add ya, very keen and full all weekend for tournaments

Hi! Interested in the team!

Rank: Bronze 2
Role Preferred: Support
Champs: Thresh, Alistar, Braum (the beast), blitzcrank
Comms: Both Skype and curse
Age: 23
